entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is experiencing a headache and wants to go to the hospital wing.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts who claims that Harry was stimulated by clairvoyant vibrations in her room.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, to whom he says goodbye before leaving the class.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person who has given Harry advice on what to do if his scar hurts him again.

relationships.description: Harry and Professor Trelawney have an interaction where she tries to convince him to stay, but he refuses.
Harry says goodbye to Ron before leaving the class.
Sirius has given Harry advice on what to do if his scar hurts him again, which Harry is following.
